speaker: Gypsum
dialogue: Hey there River, I see you're in need of some new clothes. I specialize in creating unique garments that not only look good, but also give you special abilities.

speaker: River
dialogue: Really? That sounds amazing. What kind of materials do you use?

speaker: Gypsum
dialogue: Oh, all sorts of things. We use materials found in the environment like different types of plants and minerals. We also use materials taken from defeated beasts, like scales and fur. Each material has its own unique properties that we can harness to create powerful garments.

speaker: River
dialogue: Wow, that's incredible. Can you show me some examples?

speaker: Gypsum
dialogue: Of course! I have a cloak made from dragon scales that provides extra protection from fire. And a pair of boots made from the fur of a griffin that allows the wearer to jump higher. The possibilities are endless, and I love experimenting with new materials and designs.
